A

AbstractGesture - Class in it.polito.computervision.gestures
Implements the common functionality of a gesture (getters and GestureState update).
AbstractGesture(String, boolean) - Constructor for class it.polito.computervision.gestures.AbstractGesture
Creates a new gesture
AbstractVirtualScreen - Class in it.polito.computervision.virtualscreen
Implements the common functionality of a VirtualScreen
AbstractVirtualScreen() - Constructor for class it.polito.computervision.virtualscreen.AbstractVirtualScreen
Initializes an empty virtual screen.
AbstractVirtualScreen(Size, float) - Constructor for class it.polito.computervision.virtualscreen.AbstractVirtualScreen
Initializes the virtual screen with the given size and depth
AbstractVirtualScreenInitializer - Class in it.polito.computervision.virtualscreen
Provides a base implementation, taking care of thread management and callback notification.
AbstractVirtualScreenInitializer(boolean) - Constructor for class it.polito.computervision.virtualscreen.AbstractVirtualScreenInitializer
 
ActionManager - Class in it.polito.computervision.actions
Singleton that acts as a dispatcher for Gesture events.
ActionManager() - Constructor for class it.polito.computervision.actions.ActionManager
 
addGestureListener(GestureListener) - Method in class it.polito.computervision.gestures.GestureManager
Adds a GestureListener to all registered gestures.
addVirtualScreenListener(VirtualScreenListener) - Method in class it.polito.computervision.virtualscreen.VirtualScreenManager
Adds a new VirtualScreenListener
